title: Interpretation of a dream about vitiligo and leprosy

preview.html: The meaning of vitiligo for an unmarried girl, a married woman, a pregnant woman, a divorced woman, a married or unmarried man, whether in the body, face, palm, and the like according to Ibn Sirin, Imam Al-Sadiq and Al-Nabul. Vitiligo will symbolize in a dream. Vitiligo: Whoever sees that he is afflicted with vitiligo, this is a bad secret. Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of vitiligo in Dream Muhammad Ibn Sirin was able to narrate the interpretation of the meaning of vitiligo and leprosy in a dream in Chapter 25 of his book The Interpretation of Great Dreams, which is the section devoted to communicating signs of harm and illness in a dream. It is praiseworthy if one sees it on his hand or foot. While there was the opinion of commentators, where it was said that leprosy and vitiligo indicate puns, gossip and bad words to the beholder, and that leprosy is an indication of psychological problems and fears, especially if they appear on the head or face. Vitiligo and leprosy in one dreamSeeing a girl An unmarried woman or an unmarried woman means seeing vitiligo and leprosy in a dream, which is an indication of wealth, sustenance, or benefit that someone obtains. Psychological problems and fears, and it can indicate money if a single woman feels happy when she sees her. Leprosy in a married woman’s dream. Seeing leprosy on the hand of a married woman is a sign of halal food and a lot of money. As for seeing leprosy all over her body, face and neck, it indicates the presence of problems and severe anxiety or serious marital conflict. The best vision for a married woman is to see leprosy affecting the body in small areas and spots and not affecting the face. As for the wife who sees her husband suffering from leprosy and vitiligo, this is good if she sees A married woman or felt disgusted by it and repelled, and seeing leprosy for men is praiseworthy and good. The best vision is seeing an infection with leprosy or vitiligo that is not visible to others, such as an infection in the abdomen or back, that is, in areas that are not visible to others, and a married woman seeing leprosy. Vitiligo in her leg indicates travel or estrangement from her husband in the hope of earning money and livelihood. Vitiligo in a dream of pregnancy. In general, if a pregnant woman has any disease or skin disease, this is evidence of goodness. It is a good vision for her and portends recovery and the soon death of anxiety and exhaustion. Signs Other for vitiligo in a dream. Leprosy on the hand, palm, or forearm: a sign and good news about money. Leprosy in the face, neck, or face: a sign of worries, problems, and troubles. Leprosy in the chest: a sign of sadness, weakness, and clenching of the hand. Leprosy in the abdomen or waist: good news for pregnancy. Or good news. Leprosy in the foot, leg or thigh: an indication of a dangerous struggle or fruitful travel and work. In general, seeing leprosy or vitiligo on the body is a sign of a change and a significant improvement in living and nutritional conditions. Interpretation of a dream about vitiligo - YouTube

title: The 20 most important interpretations of a dream about a person wanting to bewitch me, according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about someone who wants to be enchanted: Magic in general is not a good thing, but rather indicates some unpleasant events that occur in a person’s life. As for the appearance of magic in a person’s dream, it is a sign of some things that we detail in the article below. ... Follow us well. Interpretation of a dream about a person who wants to bewitch. Seeing magic in a dream or being bewitched by someone is one of the dreams that the dreamer must pay attention to and ask God for protection from seeing it. In the event that the dreamer sees someone who wants to bewitch him in a dream, This means that the dreamer has many enemies lurking around him and he needs to beware of them. When the dreamer sees a magician who wants to bewitch him in his dream, it symbolizes hypocrites and many enemies in his life and he must beware of them. If the dreamer sees someone in a dream who wants to bewitch him and he cannot stop him, then this It is a sign of a problem that the dreamer will fall into and God will save him from it by His command. If the dreamer sees in a dream that the priest wants to bewitch him and prevent him from doing so, then it is a good omen and evidence that worries and problems will stop. Interpretation of a dream about someone who wants to bewitch by Ibn Sirin. It was narrated by Imam Ibn They will see that seeing sorcery in a dream indicates the dreamer’s weak faith and delayed obedience. If the dreamer sees someone he knows who wants to bewitch him, it is interpreted that the dreamer will be subjected to his trials until the Lord tests his patience with him, but it will pass quickly, God willing. The Imam also believes that seeing someone he knows wants to If he bewitches you, this is a sign that this person does not bring you good, but rather wants to harm you. Interpretation of a dream about a person who wants to bewitch me. Seeing someone who wants to bewitch me in a dream with a single woman symbolizes that the dreamer is announcing negative thoughts and psychological exhaustion that makes her feel anxious. If The girl saw someone who she did not know who wanted to seduce her, this means that she is going through a difficult period in which she feels confused because she has not been able to achieve her dreams yet. Imam Ibn Shaheen narrated that seeing a girl whom she wants to seduce in a dream indicates that her fiancé does not deserve her and does not love her. It causes her seizures. If an unmarried woman sees in a dream that someone is following her and wants to bewitch her in the dream, this means that someone is trying to harm and hurt her and she should be very careful about him. If a girl sees in a dream someone who wants to bewitch her and writes some spells on The walls of her house, it is interpreted that the dreamer is far from good worship and is performing some bad deeds that negatively affect her. Magic in an unmarried woman’s dream indicates worldly sorrow that the girl is exposed to, and she must have faith, respect the teachings of religion, and God will protect her from all evil. Interpretation of a dream about a person who wants to bewitch me with a married woman. Seeing someone who wants to bewitch me as a married woman indicates That the dreamer is going through a psychological crisis and feels lonely and uncomfortable in her life. If a married woman sees in a dream someone she knows who wants to bewitch her, it is interpreted that this person is not good and she will respond to her deceiver in reality. Imam Ibn Sirin believes that seeing a person who

title: Interpretation of losing shoes in a dream (Interpretation of losing shoes in a dream by Ibn Sirin).

preview.html: In our article today, we will learn about the interpretation of losing shoes in a dream. Shoes are one of the important symbols in a dream that carry certain connotations. Therefore, losing them in a dream disturbs those who have these visions, and they do not know whether their interpretation is good or bad. Many are searching for an interpretation of the vision of losing shoes in a dream in detail, because it is one of the most common visions in the world of dreams, which dreamers see on different occasions. Which makes him curious to know the symbols of this vision, as some may think that it is just a dream or self-talk, that is, just a false vision that is incorrect, but in fact, the dream of shoes has many different interpretations. Between good and evil, what did the major dream interpreters say about the meaning of this vision? You can learn this in an encyclopedia. Interpretation of losing shoes in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The scholar Ibn Sirin says that losing shoes in a dream indicates that the owner of this dream has lost something in reality, such as losing a skill or strength that he had. Losing shoes in a dream also symbolizes the separation of a person dear to him. The dreamer. If one dreams of losing his shoe or falling into the sea, this means that the dreamer’s wife is very sick, but she will overcome her illness. Dreaming of searching for a lost shoe in a strange place indicates that the dreamer will suffer a loss in his business or money, or disputes will break out between him and his wife. His wife may lead to their divorce. An ominous dream is that he loses a shoe in a public place, because that means that the dreamer will be exposed to a scandal in his life. Whoever dreams of a child losing his shoe, the dream indicates that this child needs care and attention from his mother and father. The dream of losing his shoe Shoes in an unknown place symbolizes the dreamer losing his money in a way that will lead him to poverty. If one sees in his dream that his shoes have been lost after he placed them somewhere, this means that he cannot achieve the happiness he hopes for. Whoever sees in his dream that he is searching for A missing shoe, and he was married to two women, indicates that he wronged one of his wives. Ibn Sirin mentioned in the book Interpretation of Dreams that seeing the loss of shoes in a dream represents the dreamer losing an important matter or person in his life. Interpretation of losing shoes in a dream Dream interpretation jurists have suggested that losing shoes In the dream, it indicates consanguineous marriage if the leather shoes are made of horse skin. If the shoes are silver, this indicates marriage to a woman of good morals and religion. If she loses the yellow shoes, this indicates that the dreamer is going through a crisis that makes him feel distressed. If the shoes that The dreamer loses a white shoe, this indicates marriage to a woman of good character. As for the interpretation of seeing the loss of a green shoe, it symbolizes the dreamer’s quest for psychological peace and pleasure. When you dream of finding a shoe after losing it, this is a sign of kindness and livelihood, as the dream symbolizes an increase in money. If one of the shoes is lost, then this dream is one of the good dreams that expresses material loss. The previous vision for a married person symbolizes marital strife that portends separation, and God knows best. This vision also symbolizes for someone who married a woman.

title: Interpretation of seeing a dead child in a single woman’s dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: What you do not know about seeing a dead child in a single woman’s dream. Interpretation of seeing a dead child in a single woman’s dream. What did Ibn Sirin say about seeing the death of a child in a dream? What is the interpretation of seeing the death of a child in an unmarried woman’s dream and crying over him intensely? Does a dead male child differ in its connotations from a female child? Explore in detail the connotations of the dream in the following article. Do you have a confused dream? what are you waiting for; Google is an Egyptian site for interpreting dreams. Seeing a dead child in a single woman’s dream. The interpretation of seeing a dead child in a dream indicates rescue from the enemy’s plan, specifically if the dead child is male and not female. If an unmarried woman dreams that she gave birth to a child and died shortly after, the scene shows the disappearance of sadness and resolution. Problems. If an unmarried woman sees a dead child in her dream, this means disappointment, loss and failure. If an unmarried woman sees one of her family members dying in a dream from a scorpion sting, this indicates envy that will afflict this child and make him seriously ill in the near future. If the fortune-teller sees in a dream that her younger brother, who was actually suffering from an illness, died in the dream, then he will recover from his illness and God will give him life and health. And when an unmarried woman sees in her dream a child who wants food because he is hungry, and the dreamer does not care about the child’s hunger and he dies in the dream, then this It indicates her ingratitude, and it may be negligence in giving alms and zakat. In fact. Seeing a dead child in an unmarried woman’s dream, according to Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin said that a dead child in an unmarried woman’s dream indicates the end of misery, as the dreamer begins a new page in her life. An ugly, dead child in a dream indicates the end of difficult circumstances and the coming of joys, but If a beautiful child dies in the dream of a woman who grieves a lot and screams and cries loudly, this means loss of livelihood or money from her. Life. But if an unmarried woman sees in a dream a large group of dead children, the scene shows a lot of sorrow and extreme anguish. What did Ibn Sirin say about the interpretation of seeing a dead child in a single woman’s dream? The most important interpretations of seeing a dead child in a single woman’s dream: seeing a dead infant In an unmarried woman’s dream, seeing a dead infant in a dream for an unmarried woman means unhappy news and difficult circumstances in which he lives, and this interpretation is specific to seeing the death of a beautiful infant, even if the infant looked like a snake or predatory animals and died in it. The dream, and the dreamer felt safe and comfortable after getting rid of him, the dream is interpreted as a hypocrite and a false enemy, and he was wearing a mask of innocence and high morals in order to attract the dreamer and then harm her. But God will destroy him, reveal his secret, and remove him from the path of the dreamer. Seeing a dead child coming back to life in a dream for a single woman. The dead child coming back to life again in the vision of an unmarried woman indicates the return of war and a fierce battle with one of the enemies, or that she will get rid of despair and once again enjoy the spirit of Hope and optimism. The dream often indicates the dreamer's victory and the acquisition of something that was thought to be difficult to attain, and perhaps the dream indicates victory

title: A detailed interpretation of a funeral in a dream

preview.html: Learn about the interpretation of the funeral prayer in a dream by Muhammad Ibn Sirin. Death is the only constant reality in this universe. We are all in the end and nothing is permanent except God Almighty, the Creator of the earth and those in it. They are also the Creator of the Seven Heavens. After the death of a Muslim, there are a number of rituals performed by the family, the most important of which are washing and shrouding the deceased in his honor, and the funeral procession of transporting him to his final resting place to meet. By the Lord of the Worlds, you will receive the reward for his actions in this world, except for the mercy of God Almighty. In the next article from the encyclopedia, we will review with you the interpretation of seeing the funeral prayer in a dream, so follow us. Interpretation of the funeral prayer in a dream Seeing the funeral prayer in a dream indicates the dreamer’s repentance and his return to sins and transgressions, so it is a sign of acceptance. God for his sincere repentance, and staying away from what displeases God. This vision also indicates that its owner will obtain a promotion in his professional life or a prestigious position, and God knows best. While a person’s vision of many funerals at which he prays are unpleasant visions, they indicate the spread of immorality and sin in the world. The country in which he lives. Interpretation of a dream about a dead person praying in a dream. When a man sees himself walking at a funeral, this is a sign that he will be exposed to many problems at work, which can be eliminated by organizing his thinking and working to follow the right path. Also, seeing a dead person praying in The dream means that the dreamer feels many negative emotions within him, which create many problems for him in his real life. Interpretation of the funeral prayer in one dream: Seeing an unmarried woman crying for herself at a friend’s funeral shows her that she has gone through a difficult period of problems and pressures that are negatively affecting On her relationship with this friend, which makes her feel guilty because of her shortcomings. When an unmarried woman dreams that she goes with a man she does not know to someone’s funeral, this is a sign that she will be exposed to a period of pressure and trouble, but God Almighty will give her a pious man who will propose to her. She has something that will make her life better, God willing. Interpretation of a dream about funeral prayer for a married woman: Seeing a married woman walking at her husband’s funeral shows that she is going through a period of problems with her husband, but she will be able to overcome them soon and her family’s circumstances will improve, God willing. And when a married woman sees her children walking at a funeral Someone, this is a sign that this person abused her children, so she must take some measures to prevent that person from abusing her children. Seeing funeral prayers in a married woman’s dream generally indicates that she is going through a difficult time, but God Almighty will comfort her and her condition will improve. Soon, God willing. Interpretation of a dream about praying for a well-known dead person. Seeing the funeral prayer for a well-known dead person in a mosque indicates that this dead person is going through difficult times, and he must pray over him and take money as charity for his soul to have mercy on his soul. Also, this vision may indicate the existence of some differences between the owner The vision of this deceased person, and this vision stems from the owner’s desire to forgive the deceased person. Interpretation of a dream about praying for an unknown dead person. Seeing the funeral prayer for an unknown dead person.

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a flood in a dream - a symbol of seeing a flood in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a flood in a dream - a symbol of seeing a flood in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a flood in a dream and the dream by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi. We present to you the website Moments, which is in a dream an enemy attack, and an enemy attack is a torrent, so anyone who sees a torrent of rain will be injured, sick, or travel. If the river rises in the shops, it is a flood or gas from the Sultan. And whoever dreams: to prevent the torrent. From reaching his home, then he heals an enemy preventing him from harming his family or his environment. The torrent indicates the enemy if he demolishes the monastery, damages trees, kills animals, or drowns people. If the world benefits from it, it shows successive good deeds, and the torrent shows humor in the sayings and lies in The article: If the torrent is flowing with blood and corpses, then it indicates hatred for God Almighty, and seeing the torrent is evidence of rain falling. Perhaps the torrent at a time other than its proper time indicates an innovation from the direction from which the torrent came. Whoever sees: that the torrent entered people’s homes and took their money and animals. It is an enemy that attacks them. The torrent in the winter indicates an unruly people who do not know them. And if he cannot pass, let him sit in front of the ruler and not disobey his ruler. The entry of the torrent into the city indicates an epidemic if it is colored with blood or dark. Interpretation of a dream about torrent by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a torrent. By Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin interpreted the dream of a torrent entering an area as an indication of the diseases that afflict the inhabitants of that region, and also indicates the damage that will be caused to them. Ibn Sirin interpreted the dream of a torrent to mean soldiers entering the cities and regions they were going to enter. Ibn Sirin interpreted a dream The torrent means demolishing houses and causing harm to their owners. It indicates the presence of enemies of the dreamer or the dreamer who is subjected to great injustice. It is also stated in Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of the dream of torrent that it is a sign of the injustice and attack of the enemies. It is a sign of the unjust ruler. Ibn Sirin interpreted the dream to mean that the gutters It runs without rain because this is an indication of the flow of blood in that area. It is also a sign of the outbreak of war and destruction in this area. Ibn Sirin interpreted the dream of streams flowing from the presence of rain as a sign of anguish, stagnation, and sadness. This dream can also explain the prosperity of life and the flourishing of life. Ibn Sirin interpreted the dream of closing the door of the house to prevent the flood from entering inside, as this aims to confront problems and find solutions for them.Interpretation of the dream of seeing a flood in a dream for a single woman. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a flood for a single woman. The great scholar Ibn Sirin confirmed that seeing an unmarried girl in a dream means a transformation. Large and essential for the dreamer. This change is good, especially if the houses or clothes in the house are not destroyed. As for the single person’s vision about the seal and how he was able to escape from it. It was not damaged, this is an indication that she overcame difficulties and problems in her personal and professional life. This also means Abundance of food, recovery from illness, and if an unmarried girl sees that she will be saved from death or drowned in a torrent by someone, this means her soon and happy marriage, as it means traveling to...

title: Interpretation of seeing death by drowning in a dream

preview.html: There are people who drowned and no one found their body, and this causes a lot of sadness for the people of that drowned person. Therefore, seeing death by drowning in a dream is one of the things that worries the dreamer, but Ibn Sirin confirms that the interpretation of this dream was not bad in all cases, as there are some good dreams. Interpretation of seeing death by drowning by Ibn Sirin: Whoever dreams that he is drowning in a swimming pool, this indicates that he will be exposed to some difficulties on the journey if he plans it, and he will also be exposed to many worries and extreme sadness. Seeing a pond or lake in general is not good in a dream. Whoever sees in a dream that He drowns in a pool or lake with impure water, then these are the difficulties he will go through in his life in the coming period. Whoever sees in a dream that his daughter drowns and dies, this is a warning of fear for that girl because she is exposed to danger or illness. The person who sees the dream is saving someone from drowning, this indicates However, he actually helped a friend. Whoever sees himself drowning until he reaches the bottom will be severely punished for his bad deeds. If one sees that he is drowning in a pool of blood, this indicates that this person is harming many people and treating them violently. Drowning in blood is evidence of forbidden money and bad deeds. The dreamer. Interpretation of temporary drowning for a single man: If an unmarried girl sees her drowning brother in a dream, this is evidence of the approaching date of her marriage. If she sees her brother drowning, and there is screaming and a slap, then this is a sign of sadness and misfortunes to which the girl is exposed. Interpretation of temporary drowning for a married woman. A married woman who sees herself drowning, then this Evidence of her desire to leave her home and the extent of her neglect of her children and husband, as it indicates her desire for divorce. Interpretation of death by drowning for a pregnant woman if seen by womenIf a pregnant woman dreams that she is drowning, this is an indication that she will give birth to a boy. Seeing a pregnant woman drowning in her dream indicates a male child who will have a great relationship In the future.Interpretation of a man’s death by drowning. I see myself drowning in a dream. A single man indicates that this dreamer is preoccupied with the world and does not care about the afterlife. Seeing a man drowning in his dream in general means that he has committed adultery and is far from God Almighty and from matters of religion that must be approached. Add the dream that you would like to interpret in Comment below the article and we will respond to it and clarify it

title: Metal money in a dream for a married woman

preview.html: Today we will report the interpretation and clues collected for this dream through our website gptafser.com/, so follow us.Interpretation of seeing coins in a dream for one girlWhen a girl sees that the coins are fake, this indicates that she is being talked to behind her back. And God knows best. A girl who sees coins in a dream symbolizes the profits she makes from her own work. Finding coins indicates finding something. Coins indicate bad talk about her and she will get a big profit, God willing. As for silver money, It is better to marry a rich man who has a lot of money. Finding the coin after losing it symbolizes that he will reconsider and come to his senses again. If he gives the coin to its owner after finding it. It indicates the good deeds that this girl does. When the money is removed Minerals from the earth, this means a good reputation among people. Coins are considered a sign that they bring many benefits, God willing. Seeing a girl in a dream counting coins indicates her life full of happiness that will come to her, God willing. A person in a dream when he offers coins and she takes them The girl is from him. Perhaps this is evidence that she will get help from someone to improve her standard of living so that she can enjoy life, and God knows best. See also: Interpretation of seeing coins in a dream by Imam Al-Sadiq. Interpretation of seeing coins in a dream for a married woman. Collecting coins from the ground for a married woman indicates That she will have good luck. Coins also indicate the next good thing for this woman. Taking notes means great work and has a very social status that her husband will approve of. Burying coins by a woman in her dream symbolizes that she is in a difficult financial situation due to the financial crisis. She has to She is committed to asking for forgiveness and charity until God frees her. Seeing coins and a displaced woman may bring good news that she will earn a great livelihood, and perhaps this livelihood is the acquisition of a treasure. And if he sees coins with paper money in them, which is a vision that does not deserve praise, then he will bear the problems that this woman faces. Women, God knows best. When she sees bills she gets them from her companions. A sign that this man is a good girl, and he is defending her right not to be there. If he collects money lying on the ground, this symbolizes very goodness. It is considered seeing money made of metal Not paper, in a dream. Good news for the good halal money that she will obtain in the near future. Seeing her taking coins indicates that her husband will secure a job in a prestigious position, God willing. Perhaps the interpretation of seeing paper and metal money is a problem in a woman’s life, for God is Most High and Most Knowing. When she sees herself offering coins to someone in a dream. It is a sign that he is doing deeds that God and His Messenger love, such as good deeds. If she sees her husband counting in coins, it may be food from God. It could be the uncle

title: Interpretation of a dream about an elephant in the sea

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about an elephant in the sea in a dream. Here we will learn about one of the dreams that many people see and want to know all the interpretations and connotations of this vision and whether they are good or bad dreams, because today they are detailed. Interpretation of a dream about an elephant in the sea in a dream. Whoever sees in a dream that he is riding an elephant swimming in the water This is a sign of his struggle and victory over enemies. Seeing an elephant swimming in a dream is a sign of victory and reaching the required period. Anyone who dreams that an elephant is swimming in the sea in a dream is a sign of earning a lot of money or getting close to marriage. Seeing an elephant swimming in the sea in The dream is a sign of the lawful money that the dreamer receives and its abundance. Interpretation of a dream about an elephant in the house in a dream: Seeing an elephant inside the house in a dream means that one of the family members will go for Hajj or Umrah. Seeing an elephant inside the house in a dream indicates pregnancy for its owner or imminent birth. Dream For a pregnant woman, the presence of an elephant in her house in a dream is a sign that she lives with a lot of money and children. Seeing an elephant in the garden of the house in a dream is a sign of psychological comfort and kindness that will come to them in life. Interpretation of a dream about a small elephant in a dream: Whoever sees in his dream and places an elephant A small sign of some obstacles and problems in the future of the vision. Dreaming of a baby elephant in a dream is a sign that there are some things that make him very angry. When a man sees that there is a baby elephant in front of him, this is a sign of the abundance of money that he will receive. Seeing a baby elephant indicates It is seen that the dreamer aims to earn a lot of money. Interpretation of a dream about the death of an elephant in a dream: Whoever sees the death of an elephant in a dream, it is a sign of his victory over his enemies and the power that he gains. If a man sees the death of an elephant in a dream, this is a sign of the dominance and high status that he It will reach her. Seeing the death of an elephant in a dream indicates the destruction of the sultan, leader, or king. When you see the death of an elephant in a dream, this is an indication that you will get a lot of money or a high position at work. Interpretation of a dream about a raging elephant in a dream If a married woman sees that An angry elephant is chasing her in a dream, as this is a sign of her happiness and imminent pregnancy. A dream about a raging elephant in a dream that was black in color is a sign of the abundance of money that the dreamer obtains. Seeing a raging elephant in a dream indicates upcoming victories and happiness in the dreamer’s life. When seeing an angry elephant In a dream, a married man is a sign of marital happiness and peace of mind that he will soon have. Interpretation of a dream about an elephant chasing me in a dream. Anyone who dreams of being chased by an elephant is a sign of the illness that will afflict him in the coming period. A dream about being chased by an elephant in a dream is a sign that there is an enemy nearby. It causes him great harm. Chasing an elephant in a dream is evidence of the imminent death of a sick man, and God Almighty knows best. If an elephant chases a visionary quickly in a dream, this is evidence of the dreamer’s closeness to kings and rulers. Interpretation of a dream of ivory in a dream Seeing ivory in a dream means that the dreamer will have A lot of pain
